definition: characterized by dignity and propriety, cause to be calm or quiet as by administering a sedative to
details:
adjective
- characterized by dignity and propriety
= synonyms: staid
- dignified and somber in manner or character and committed to keeping promises
= synonyms: sober
verb
- cause to be calm or quiet as by administering a sedative to
= example: cause to be calm or quiet as by administering a sedative to
= synonyms: calm
